Ionic extensions get materialized, with no additional code needed. View Ionic's Extensions API for implementation details.

Material Loading Template
$ionicLoading.show({ template: '<div class="loader"><svg class="circular"><circle class="path" cx="50" cy="50" r="20" fill="none" stroke-width="2" stroke-miterlimit="10"/></svg></div>' });
To Add Ink
var alertPopup = $ionicPopup.alert({ title: 'You are now my subscribed to Cat Facts', template: 'You will meow receive fun daily facts about CATS!' }); // to activate ink on modal $timeout(function() { ionicMaterialInk.displayEffect(); }, 0);
